DOC.brief_title: Effect Reducing Uric Acid Insulin Sensitivity Oxidative Status
DOC.detailed_description: It hypothesize oxidative stress involve pathogenesis insulin resistance associate obesity . Circulating uric acid ( UA ) body 's major endogenous plasma antioxidant . Therefore , investigator evaluate whether alteration serum UA concentration affect : 1 ) systemic skeletal muscle oxidative stress , 2 ) total antioxidant capacity , 4 ) skeletal muscle insulin sensitivity hyperinsulinemic-euglycemic clamp .
DOC.criteria: obese ( BMI 3045 kg/m2 ) ; serum UA concentration either ≥5 mg/dL ≤4.0 mg/dL ( 297 µmol/L ) ] , renal dysfunction ( serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL ) ; pregnancy lactating ; take uratelowering agent , thiazide diuretic , prednisone medication contain aspirin salicylate ; history xanthinuria , type 2 diabetes significant organ system dysfunction ; G6PD deficiency ; use hormonereplacement oralcontraceptive therapy ; smoke tobacco ; anemic ( Hb < 10 g/dl )
